name: Reggie Miller
description: 6'7" shooting guard, known for his clutch shooting, trash talk, and rivalry with the New York Knicks. Extremely fit and lean build.

choke-sign.name: The Choke Sign
choke-sign.description: Making the 'choke' gesture towards Spike Lee during the 1994 Eastern Conference Finals
choke-sign.prompt: Reggie Miller, intensely focused, hands near his neck forming a choke gesture, directed at Spike Lee sitting courtside - game intensity, MSG crowd blurred in background, late in the game, confident smirk

running-arms-out.name: Running Arms Out Celebration
running-arms-out.description: Running down the court with arms outstretched after hitting a big shot
running-arms-out.prompt: Reggie Miller sprinting down the court, arms fully extended to each side, mouth wide open in a shout, uniform slightly disheveled from exertion - MSG court, Indiana Pacers colors, celebrating a clutch basket

high-knee-3pt.name: High-Knee Three Pointer
high-knee-3pt.description: His unique shooting form with a high knee lift on his jump shot
high-knee-3pt.prompt: Reggie Miller elevated for a three-point jump shot, right knee raised high in his distinctive shooting motion, eyes locked on the basket, left arm extended for balance - clean shooting form, basketball in hand, follow through

pointing-to-wrist.name: Miller Time
pointing-to-wrist.description: Pointing to his wrist, indicating it's 'Miller Time' - time for him to take over the game
pointing-to-wrist.prompt: Reggie Miller pointing emphatically to his wrist, signaling 'Miller Time', sweat dripping from brow, intense game situation, slight smirk - confident swagger, MSG arena, late game pressure

post-shot-stance.name: Holding the Follow Through
post-shot-stance.description: Standing tall holding his shooting form after a successful shot.
post-shot-stance.prompt: Reggie Miller standing tall in his follow-through after releasing a jump shot, arm extended perfectly, eyes tracking the ball's trajectory, unwavering confidence - game-winning shot, focused intensity, arena lights shining
